thread.title: Israeli tech firm undercuts facial recognition to bolster privacy

title: Israeli tech firm undercuts facial recognition to bolster privacy
text:
Israeli tech firm undercuts facial recognition to bolster privacy 1:44am IST - 02:02 
Riding the wave of a global push to comply with new privacy standards, a small Israeli company believes it can help you, and your face, stay anonymous in a hyper-connected world. Rinat Harash reports from Tel Aviv. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Riding the wave of a global push to comply with new privacy standards, a small Israeli company believes it can help you, and your face, stay anonymous in a hyper-connected world. Rinat Harash reports from Tel Aviv. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EJhXiC
